details.full_description: Vegetables in your diet are extremely important. Veggies are rich in nutrients and antioxidants, which boost your health, help fight off disease and weight control due to their low-calorie content.
It is an excellent way to consume multiple vegetables. Adding even a small amount of extra veggies, such as broccoli, to soups is a great way to increase your intake of fiber, vitamins, and minerals.
Wrap your sandwich inside a leafy green, like a lettuce wrap. Rich in vitamins and antioxidants, vegetables also add nice crunch and flavour to sandwiches.
Greens like spinach, kale, and arugula are unnoticeable when mixed with sweet berries, grapes, apples, and juices.

Veggies a regular part of your eating habits, significantly increase your intake of fiber, nutrients, and antioxidants. Eating enough vegetables is also associated with a reduced risk of heart disease and cancer and many more.
details.header: Start every meal with a salad
